original_text: before the silver cord is snapped, or the golden bowl is broken, or the pitcher is shattered at the fountain, or the wheel broken at the cistern,
korean_text: 은 줄이 풀리고 금 그릇이 깨지고 항아리가 샘 곁에서 깨지고 바퀴가 우물 위에서 깨지고

sentences.original_text: before the silver cord is snapped
or the golden bowl is broken
or the pitcher is shattered at the fountain
or the wheel broken at the cistern
